remarks:
Formula-building lemma for use with the Distinctor Reduction Theorem. Part of Theorem 9.4 of [Megill] p. 448 (p. 16 of preprint). (Contributed by NM, 24-Nov-1994.)  Remove dependency on ~ ax-11 . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 6-Sep-2018.) 

---

 Formula-building lemma for use with the Distinctor Reduction Theorem. Part of Theorem 9.4 of [Megill] p. 448 (p. 16 of preprint). (Contributed by NM, 24-Nov-1994.)
statement:
dral1.1 $e |- ( A. x x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
dral1 $p |- ( A. x x = y -> ( A. x ph <-> A. y ps ) ) $.
